item.description:
Hostelling International’s Cultural Café series of fundraising dinners is sailing over to Rangzen Tibetan to enjoy fresh wholesome Tibetan food. Join us for a night full of lively conversation and unique food and beverages – all while supporting a great cause!

 

Time: Tuesday, April 5th, 6-8 PM (Note: time is earlier than usual)

Place: Rangzen Tibetan Place- 24 Pearl Street, Cambridge, MA 02139

Fee: $30 includes meal, gratuity, and a donation to Cultural Kitchen

 

You MUST pre-register for this event:  https://co.clickandpledge.com/advanced/default.aspx?wid=39329 – Cultural Cafe event seats are limited, so don’t miss out! You may also buy tickets offline by contacting Laurine at admin@usahostels.org or at 617-718-7990 ext 10.

 

Past customers of Rangzen Tibetan Place have said the following about the restaurant: "I love the inside of this place. The moment you walk in here, you feel like you've walked into another country almost, or at least into a home or dining room in Tibet itself." -Sarah G. "The food is delightful and they are great about dealing with dietary restrictions and allergies" -Allix T.

Check out the menu: http://rangzenrestaurant.com/menu.html

 

More about Cultural Café and Cultural Kitchen:

 

For over a year, Hostelling International USA’s Cultural Café has been exploring the diverse cultures and cuisines Boston-area restaurants have to offer. Cultural Café is an enjoyable meal shared among fellow members of the community, and also raises funds for Cultural Kitchen, Hostelling International’s program for inner-city youth, as well as other educational and outreach programs and initiatives. For all the latest updates, consider joining the Facebook group New Boston Hostel.

As an afterschool activity, Cultural Kitchen teaches Boston area youth about culture and diversity using cooking as the primary vehicle - just like travelers at our hostels learn about one another while cooking together in the hostel kitchen. For more information, please visit www.culturalkitchenboston.org
item.how_to_find_us: Don't worry we'll find you! Someone will be by the door to greet you.
item.why: You get the benefit of enjoying unique local food, while participating in lively conversations with people you've just meet, but most importantly your donation is helping to raise funds to support Cultural Kitchen's after school program.

group.name: Cultural Caf√© - Dine Out for a Cause

item.name: Cultural Cafe: Lets sail over to Tibet!
